purpose.en: A conversation to guide a contributor through adding valuable information to an existing Bus Stop.
purpose.fr: Une conversation pour guider un contributer dans l'ajout d'informations utiles à un Arrêt de bus existant.

generic.fr: Il y a un arrêt de bus pas loin, est-ce que tu le vois?
generic.en: There is a bus stop nearby, can you see it?

contextual.fr: Il y a un arrêt de bus pas loin, tu arrives à le voir malgré l'obscurité?
contextual.en: There is a bus stop nearby. I know it is dark but can you see it?

generic.fr: Super! Tu pourrais me dire comment il s'appelle?
generic.en: Awesome! Would you be able to tell me its name?
Cool! Do you know its name?

generic.fr: C'est top. Bon maintenant, il faut trouver son nom, tu le connais?
generic.en: It's great. Now, let's find its name. Do you know its name?

generic.fr: Merci beaucoup! Tu m'enverrais sa photo?
generic.en: Thank you so much! Would you send me its picture?

contextual.fr: Trop bien! Tu me ferais un petit selfie avec lui (mais juste lui hein)?
contextual.en: Awesome! Would you take a selfie with it? (well just with it actually)?

contextual.fr: Trop bien! Une petite photo comme d'hab?
contextual.en: Awesome! A little picture as usual?

generic.en: Thanks for everything! It helps a lot
